comments.body: Weren't there some basic requirements such as name and version? Maybe we can narrow this a bit.

There is, and there's a separate type for that in this same file.  The simple requirement from Hapi is that you must provide a name.  The version is optional.  In place of this, you can require your package.json file, so this line ends up looking like:

pkg: require("../package.json")

I wasn't sure of the utility of trying to type that.

The full definition of this type, btw, is:

`export type Plugin = PluginBase & (PluginNameVersion | PluginPackage);`
